p: where h(t) is the thickness of the supraglacial debris layer at time t, c is the englacial debris concentration (by volume), A eff is the effective ice down-wasting rate, ɛ d is the bulk erosion rate of the supraglacial debris, ϕ is the average bulk porosity of the resulting supraglacial debris and Γ is the average rockfall accumulation rate.
